data.description:
You are in the middle of a strictly controlled society due to the outbreak of the zombie virus. You are the only one who can solve the problems of this world, but the enemies mistake you for being malicious and attack you. Use your telekinesis and superpowers to defeat the enemies and move forward to save the world.

Cardio Combat Fighter is an action fighting game designed for fitness experience. Burn calories while you level up your character and challenge yourself to higher levels through repeated play. 

Key Features:
- Demo version: You can play 2 stages for free in this demo version.

- Immersiveness: Offers an immersive gaming experience through a variety of fighting animations and high-level physics modeling.

- Fitness Experience: This game is designed to encourage users to move in different ways through various forms of action, such as attack, dodge, and grab. The different forms of action in the game require players to move their bodies in different ways, which can help them to burn calories and improve their fitness levels, while also having fun.

- Repeatability: Level up your character and challenge yourself to higher levels through repeated play. Even though it is a demo version, you will need to spend at least 10 hours to finish all the levels.
